desc: Luxury men's and women's footwear and accessories, imported from Italy. Designers include: 7:AM, Giovanni Fabiani, Loriblu, Alberto Gozzi, Giorgio Fabiani, Ilasio Renzoni, Fabi, Nando Muzi, Fiorangelo, Rossi, Giorgio 1958, Jo Ghost, Gianfranco Butteri, Cesare Paciotti, Lorenzi, Barracuda and more!
